Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Kitteh = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local kittehClone
local healthConnection
local kittehCo
local enemyChar
local prevHealth = 100 -- maxHealth, so that the kitteh doesn't go all out
local kittehDamage = 40
local kittehAOE = Vector3.new(20, 20, 20)
local angrySound local meowSound
function bite() if kittehClone and enemyChar then enemyHumanoid = enemyChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if enemyHumanoid and enemyHumanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid then enemyHumanoid:TakeDamage(kittehDamage) end enemyChar = nil if enemyConnection then enemyConnection:disconnect() end end end
function doSt00f() if kittehClone then kittehClone.Transparency = 0.0 end local sign = 1 while kittehClone and myTorso do if enemyChar then -- Attack the guy until he cries! angrySound = Kitteh:FindFirstChild("AngrySound") if angrySound and angrySound.IsPlaying == false then angrySound:Play() end enemyTorso = enemyChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if enemyTorso then kittehClone.Velocity = (enemyTorso.Position - kittehClone.Position).unit * 55.0 enemyConnection = kittehClone.Touched:connect(bite) end wait() else -- just look cool, by warping around our guy tick() kittehClone.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) -- This is bad kittehClone.Transparency = kittehClone.Transparency + sign sign = sign * -1 local direction = CFrame.Angles(0, math.random(1, 30) * math.pi/30, 0) * myTorso.CFrame.lookVector local pos = (myTorso.Position - Vector3.new(0, 2.10, 0)) + direction * 4.0 kittehClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(pos, pos + direction) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) wait(1.0) end end print("Coroutine is yielding") end
function logDamage() if myHumanoid and myTorso then local currentHealth = myHumanoid.Health if currentHealth < prevHealth then -- Someone hit the guy! and our kitteh doesn't have a target already prevHealth = currentHealth -- do this immediately to limit the kitteh's actions -- Now find the enemy that hit our d00d local tag = myHumanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag and tag.Value and tag.Value.className == "Player" then enemyChar = tag.Value.Character else -- No tag is present, comb the area local parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(myTorso.Position - kittehAOE, myTorso.Position + kittehAOE), vCharacter, 100) print(#parts) for i = 1, #parts do if parts[i].Parent and parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") and not enemyChar then print("Found enemy") print(parts[i].Parent) enemyChar = parts[i].Parent end end end else prevHealth = currentHealth -- Need this end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
myHumanoid.HealthChanged:connect(logDamage)
Tool.Enabled = false
kittehClone = Kitteh:Clone() kittehClone.CanCollide = false
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, kittehClone:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = kittehClone
local direction = CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/2, 0) * myTorso.CFrame.lookVector local pos = (myTorso.Position - Vector3.new(0, 2.10,0)) + direction * 4.0 kittehClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(pos, pos + direction) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0)
kittehClone.Parent = game.Workspace
meowSound = Kitteh:FindFirstChild("MeowSound") if meowSound then meowSound:Play() end
kittehCo = coroutine.create(doSt00f) coroutine.resume(kittehCo)
Kitteh.Transparency = 1.0
wait(18.0) if kittehClone then kittehClone:Remove() end Kitteh.Transparency = 0.0 wait(2.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if kittehClone then kittehClone:Remove() end Kitteh.Transparency = 0.0 if enemyConnection then enemyConnection:disconnect() end if meowSound then meowSound:Stop() end if angrySound then angrySound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
